function.name: search_events
function.description: Finds a list of events based on filters. Returns event details including name, description, image, URL, start date/time, and venues.

eventLocationCity.description: City where the event takes place (e.g., "London").

eventLocationCountryCode.description: ISO country code of the event location (e.g., "gb").

eventStartDate.description: Start date of the event in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd).

eventEndDate.description: End date of the event in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd).

eventName.description: Name of the event to search for.

pageSize.description: Number of results per page (Min: 1, Max: 200, Default: 50).
